select o.id orderId, o.order_no orderNo, o.kry_order_no kryOrderNo, o.meal_code mealCode, o.order_type orderType, o.customer_id customerId, o.order_status orderStatus, o.estimate_arrival_start_time estimateArrivalStartTime, o.estimate_arrival_end_time estimateArrivalEndTime, o.shop_name shopName, o.shop_id shopId, o.kry_shop_id kryShopId, o.order_prod_price orderProdPrice, o.shipping_fee shippingFee, o.order_price orderPrice, o.create_time createTime, o.remark, o.discount_amount discountAmount from `orders` o where o.del_flag = 0 and o.id = #{orderId}

select count(create_time > curdate() or null) todayOrderCount, ifnull(sum(if(create_time > curdate(), commission, 0)), 0) todaySumPrice, ifnull(sum(if(create_time < curdate() and create_time > DATE_SUB(curdate(), INTERVAL 1 DAY), commission, 0)), 0) yesterdaySumPrice from orders where share_id = #{customerId} and del_flag = 0

select o.id orderId, DATE_FORMAT(o.create_time, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i') time, c.avatar, c.nickname, o.commission from orders o left join xjs.customer c on c.customer_id = o.customer_id where o.share_id = #{customerId} order by o.create_time desc limit 3
